Name: Elemental Combat
About the game: Become fully immersed in the elemental battle! Features: - Take Control of the Elements - Fire, Earth, Air and Water in Virtual Reality! - Cross platform Multiplayer Fights - Battle in addictive 1vs1 duels to see who is the better elemental combatant on the Oculus Rift and HTC Vive - RPG Elements - Level up your character and learn new and powerful elemental abilities - Singleplayer - Fight against the A.I. and train your strategies and tactics - Ranking - Climb up the competitive latter and become the best elemental master
